comment: Syllabus says attendance is not mandatory, but I got a bad grade for attendance. Final is a group project and as long as you participate you will pass. Easy class as long as you do the work.

He is very passionate about theatre so the class is very lecture heavy and he doesnt allow you to have you phone or computers out. The syllabus says attendance isnt mandatory but he ended up putting in an "attendance and participation" grade that came out of nowhere. The class itself isnt hard as long as you do the online work and go to the plays.
